prompts: Create a bunny-like Pokemon with fluffy ears and a gentle smile.
I want a Normal-type Pokemon that can blend into forest environments.
Generate a Pokemon with long ears and a warm brown color scheme.
Make a cute Pokemon with a playful personality and agile movements.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in grasslands and loves to hop around.
Design a Pokemon with a unique fluffy tail and soft fur texture.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies elegance and agility with its design.
